summary: A young woman develops a dangerous, obsessive friendship with her new roommate and plots to murder all those who she feels have done her new friend wrong.
cast: Kristen Miller|Allison Lange|Todd Babcock|Brooke Burns|François Giroday|Tracey McCall|Rif Hutton|Kyme|Courtney Taylor Burness|Kathy Byron|Katherine Disque|Gerald Brodin|Michelle Page|Laura Rogers|Rebecca Lin|Meggan Kimberley|James Madio|Gary Riotto|Jeff Krebs|Bettina Adger|Yanni Kratsas|Avery Little|Nicole Oring
title: Mujer blanca soltera busca 2
